dialogue: Boss, I really think you're going to want to see this.
Hmm? Kid, this is...this is just a photo of you.
I know, sir. Isn't it a great pic? I’m really proud of it.
What the hell made you think that I'd want to see a photo of your face – which, by the way, is already right in front of me – while I’m in the middle of having sex.
Like I said, sir: it's just a really great pic!
